tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HospitalsInventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    item_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    expiry_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE hospitals_inventory (
  hospital_id INT,
  item_name VARCHAR(50),
  item_quantity INT,
  item_category VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (hospital_id, item_name)
)

CREATE TABLE pharmaceuticals_inventory (
  drug_id INT,
  drug_name VARCHAR(50),
  drug_quantity INT,
  expiry_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (drug_id)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_supplies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  hospital_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES hospitals(id)
);

CREATE TABLE pharmaceuticals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  expiration_date DATE,
  hospital_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES hospitals(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Hospital (
  hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hospital_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalSupply (
  supply_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supply_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Pharmaceuticals (
  medicine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medicine_name VARCHAR(255),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hospital_id INT,
  supply_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospital(hospital_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (supply_id) REFERENCES MedicalSupply(supply_id)
)
